direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate IP addresses with similar control flows and exception handling, but for different IP versions.

Both methods serve the same purpose of generating IP addresses, but one returns a string and the other an InetAddress object.

Both methods handle random generation and formatting of unique identifiers, albeit for different purposes.
